subject: Thank you for subscribing to the HP Promotional newsletter
body:
HP Email Communications 

Thank you.  Your HP Email Communication subscription 
is confirmed. 

Thank you for recently granting HP permission to communicate withyou via email. Within the next several weeks, you will beginreceiving your subscriptions for the following: 
-Monthly Promotional newsletter 
You can view and modify your subscriptions at your personalsubscription summary. As many HP newsletters are customizableplease be sure to also update your content preferences and productownership information.To ensure you receive your email subscription, please take aminute and add us to your address book. Click here toview instructions.Thanks again for subscribing!Your HP Newsletter Team 

  
__________________________________________________ 

Promotions are subject to contractual agreement. 

If you'd like to discontinue receiving e-mails from HP regarding 
special offers and information, please click here. 

HP Privacy Mailbox, 20555 SH 249, MS 040307, Houston, Texas 77070. 

HP is committed to respecting your privacy. For specific guidelines, 
read HP's privacy policy. 

© Copyright 2005 Hewlett-Packard Development Company, L.P. The 
information contained herein is subject to change without notice.
